sub_title: Central Operations Lead for Uber | MBA
summary:
I am a seasoned business developer with an MBA degree and 9+ years of experience across various areas - product and innovation management, digital and trade marketing, strategy development, and entrepreneurial environments. There is nothing I love more than solving complex challenges and bringing to life brands and business solutions that make an impact on consumers. I advocate the use of data as well as consumer and market insights in order to understand the evolving needs of society.

My experiences from working in a cross-functional and multi-cultural environment have taught me the values of empathy, collaboration, and resilience. I bring with me knowledge that has been shaped with both global and local perspectives, a journey that began from the Philippines, to France, to the US, and now based in the Netherlands. 

Some takeaways from my journey (so far):
+ Energy and gusto come from understanding the “why”
+ Embrace the art of pausing, allowing some space to reflect on the moment, that could have resulted in a different outcome
+ In every journey, there’s always an opportunity either to learn or to unlearn 

Outside of work, you will see me in the kitchen, my playground to curate recipes or someplace cozy doing meditation and yoga.

My ikigai [reason for being]: To do well by doing good.

profile_positions.description: I am responsible for defining the strategy across key program pillars and determining key projects that will drive the most impact to the business. Along with this, I also oversee the execution of projects end-to-end while partnering with key functions.
profile_positions.title: Central Operations Lead for Hailables

profile_positions.description:
I am responsible for coordinating strategic planning with Global Business Development and Country Marketing and Sales teams. With this role, I empower markets with segment trends and concepts for growth (where to play, how to play, capabilities needed). 
•	Project manager for ‘Unlock the Growth’ projects in China, Russia, Netherlands, and Japan – performing the data analysis and problem-solving needed to inform the business plan (size of prize valuated at €1.2B)
•	Lead for customer journey projects to help business teams reignite the Tommy Hilfiger touch points: retail, E-commerce, marketing, and product. Scope includes mapping the purchase path, assessing pain points and opportunities, and defining the target audience (Confidents, Trends, Quality, and Traditional, by gender and age group).
•	Lead for process improvement, project management and agile methodologies for the Customer Insights & Brand Strategy team
•	Collaborated with the PVH Covid Task Force and executed the market research and strategic analysis needed to build a brand re-entry strategy and customer engagement plan, which resulted in 41% growth for Tommy Hilfiger in Q2 2021
•	Supported the set-up of the Brand Governance process for the effective deployment of the brand strategy
profile_positions.title: Senior Specialist Brand Strategy and Planning

profile_positions.description: I served as a consultant on organizational growth, capability development, and strategy, directly reporting to the CEO and CFO. To propel the company towards its scale-up ambition, I led the design of the firm’s transformation program and purpose playbook and provided advice across different growth levers: people, execution, and strategy.
profile_positions.title: Business Consultant

profile_positions.description:
My core responsibility was to build the business sustainably, embed the strategy and manage the operations (P&L, product development and delivery, and brand activations). Along with this, I represented the Customer Development department in senior leadership discussions on product innovations, business cases, challenges and opportunities, and performance measurement. 
•	Acted as an interim lead for a team of 3 FTEs and coached a Thai expatriate who successfully completed her trainee program 
•	Led the launch of the Baby Care category in the Philippines which included an integrated go-to-market plan and consumer journey study. As a result, KPI’s overachieved by 30% and the brand won the 2018 Innovation of the Year Award.
•	Renovated the Pond’s portfolio resulting in a double-digit sales growth (€33MM turnover) and profit accretion amidst the implementation of zero based-budgeting, making the Philippines the no. 1 Pond’s business in Southeast Asia and no. 4 globally
•	Engaged with senior management and presented the business acceleration plan for Unilever Philippines Skin Care and Baby Care categories (€100MM business) which was developed with a cross-functional team that includes Brand, Analytics, and Sales
•	Worked with an agile team to deliver high-impact retail programs and speedboat innovations for the Health, Beauty, and E-commerce channels for the Face Care portfolio (€21MM business), resulting in a double-digit revenue growth in the country’s largest personal care and drugstore chain and 10 times growth in online channels
profile_positions.title: Senior Channels and Category Development Manager – Pond’s and Baby Dove

profile_positions.description:
I served as the brand guardian for Dove Masterbrand which entails defining and executing the strategy, designing programs to drive effective point of sale conversion for key accounts, and conducting in-depth business audits. 
•	Headed the strategic planning for Dove Masterbrand (€103MM business) to unlock growth opportunities and establish win-win category partnerships with key accounts; this led Dove to become the no. 1 premium Personal Care masterbrand in the country
•	Spearheaded the product innovation deployment for Dove Hair Care portfolio (€67MM business), making the Philippines the     no. 1 Dove Hair country in Southeast Asia and Australian region and the no. 5 globally 
•	Led the commercial marketing plan for Unilever Gifting and Dove’s 60th Anniversary; scope entails financial planning, design conceptualization, in-store execution, and internal engagement  
•	Developed the training modules for the Customer Marketing Academy and mentored junior members of the organization
profile_positions.title: Senior Category Operations Manager - Dove Women, Dove Men and Dove Masterbrand

profile_positions.description:
•	Managed the renovation of Tresemme (positioning, messaging, pricing, competitive research, and field enablement), which led the brand to become the fastest growing hair care brand in the country and the top Unilever PH hair brand in beauty stores and in E-commerce within 2 years from its launch in the Philippines
•	Facilitated the set-up of a new distributor, a new channel (salons), and a new business model for Unilever Prestige Personal Care
profile_positions.title: Category Operations Manager – Prestige Personal Care, Tresemme and Toni & Guy

profile_positions.description:
•	Partnered with Jollibee Foods Corporation, the largest food chain in the Philippines, for a nationwide promotion and campaign for Vaseline which resulted in a double-digit sales growth for the brand
•	Launched a new brand, Toni & Guy, in the Philippines through a strategic alliance with Watsons, the largest personal care and pharmacy chain in the country
profile_positions.title: Category Operations Executive, Unilever Philippines – Vaseline and Toni & Guy

profile_positions.description: Supported the Finance - Tax Team in their operations (subsidiary structuring project)
profile_positions.title: Finance Department Intern
